step_data.thought: I tried to cancel the selected order, but I notice an error message on the page: 'You cannot cancel the order(s).' This indicates that the system doesn't allow cancellation of this particular order. Looking at the order details, I can see that the order status is 'Closed', which explains why it can't be canceled - closed orders have already completed their lifecycle and can't be canceled anymore. Since the system explicitly prevents the cancellation of this order, I should inform the user about this limitation.
step_data.action: stop('I cannot cancel this order because it is already in a Closed status. The system shows an error message: "You cannot cancel the order(s)." Orders that are already closed cannot be canceled as they have completed their lifecycle.')
